snippet.title: Old Windows game - LightWeight Ninja (2001)
snippet.description:
Stardock which made The Corporate Machine game released interesting Ninja game in 2001.
It is the action adventure game of adventure of young ninja.
It has stories and cartoon scenes.
It looks like Sonic and Super Mario series game.

I think it's so interesting to me.
